Monster.Name: Thug
Monster.Description: Thugs are riff-raff who have turned to beatings, extorion and petty thievery.

Monster.Name: Thief
Monster.Description: Thugs who survive their brutal existance move up the criminal chain and become full-time thieves.

Monster.Name: Bandit
Monster.Description: Instead of working for a living, bandits prey off of travellers, killing and stealing.

Monster.Name: Rogue
Monster.Description: Rogues are those with thief abilities but they may not actually steal from others.

Monster.Name: Cat Burgler
Monster.Description: Cat burglers are thieves who prefer to use steath and skill to get what they want, not violence.

Monster.Name: Master Thief
Monster.Description: Cat burglers are thieves who prefer to use steath and skill to get what they want, not violence.

Monster.Name: Spy
Monster.Description: Working for a lord, an organization like the Church or some other group spies are experts at getting information they should not.

Monster.Name: Secret Agent
Monster.Description: Secret agents are spies who work for a noble, the Church or some other organization or group. Some are no better than mercenaries, while others are devoted to their cause.

Monster.Name: Spymaster
Monster.Description: Spymasters lead teams of spies. They usually work for an existing organization.

Monster.Name: Hired Killer
Monster.Description: Hired killers are those who kill people for money.

Monster.Name: Assassin
Monster.Description: Assassins are professional killers, taking lives for money. They usually use stealth and guile instead of brute force in eliminating their targets.

Monster.Name: Master Assassin
Monster.Description: Master assassins are experts at stealth and killing without being noticed.

Monster.Name: Fighter
Monster.Description: Fighters are raw and possess little training and even less experience.

Monster.Name: Warrior
Monster.Description: Warriors are experienced fighters. They possess some skill with their weapons.

Monster.Name: Mercenary
Monster.Description: Mercenaries are professional soldiers, selling their services to the highest bidder.

Monster.Name: Maurauder
Monster.Description: Maurauders are violent warriors who revel in battle, no matter the cause.

Monster.Name: Raubritter
Monster.Description: Raubritters are the dread robber knights, elite trained warriors who have turned to banditry, rape and pillage.

Monster.Name: Scout
Monster.Description: Scouts are skilled trackers and archers.

Monster.Name: Dark Ranger
Monster.Description: Dark rangers are skilled wilderness warriors who have abandoned their oaths to protect humanity and nature.

Monster.Name: Dark Knight
Monster.Description: Dark knights are corrupted knights who have turned away from service to the church or their Lords and sought out money and power.

Monster.Name: Blackguard
Monster.Description: Blackguards are villainous warriors who are pledged to dark powers.

Monster.Name: Infamous Blackguard
Monster.Description: Some blackguards become such dread champions to the powers of darkness that they become infamous and feared.

Monster.Name: Kobald
Monster.Description: Kobalds are very small, dark brown humanoids. They live in caves and often use traps and ambush to take on larger foes.

Monster.Name: Goblin
Monster.Description: Goblins are small, twisted humanoids. They are often thought to have once been gnomes, corrupted by dark magic.

Monster.Name: Orc
Monster.Description: Orcs are savage beast-men, known for their bloodlust and violent ways.

Monster.Name: Ogre
Monster.Description: Ogres are large, brutish humanoids. They often rob and pillage.

Monster.Name: Swamp Troll
Monster.Description: Swamp trolls are large humanoids with sickly green coloured skin. They can regenerate wounds but are weak to fire.

Monster.Name: Minotaur
Monster.Description: Minotaurs are large humanids who look like a perverse mixture of bull and man. They are cunning warriors and make excellent pirates and gladiators.

Monster.Name: Hill Giant
Monster.Description: Hill Giants are the smallest type of giant. Their are very powerful but often not that bright.

Monster.Name: Lizardman
Monster.Description: Lizardmen are scaly reptilian humanoids who often live in swamps and near lakes and bogs.

Monster.Name: Fire Elemental
Monster.Description: Fire elementals are the spirits of flame and energy. They were born during the explosive creation of the cosmos.

Monster.Name: Earth Elemental
Monster.Description: Earth elementals are spirits of the deep earth. They are often blamed for earthquakes and other calamaties of nature.

Monster.Name: Water Elemental
Monster.Description: Water elementals spirits who often ride on the waves. They are mercurial, sometimes calm and sometimes violent and unpredicatable likes the seas.

Monster.Name: Air Elemental
Monster.Description: Air elementals are wild and uncontrollable. You never know what they will do next.

Monster.Name: Skeleton
Monster.Description: Skeletons are the souless bodies of dead humanoids, raised up by foul necromancy.

Monster.Name: Zombie
Monster.Description: Zombies are the animated corpses of humanoids. Foul necromancies make them tough and resistant to damage.

Monster.Name: Ghoul
Monster.Description: Ghouls are undead beings who feast on flesh, living or dead.

Monster.Name: Ghast
Monster.Description: Ghasts are more powerful version of ghouls, they often use stealth and cunning to catch their prey.

Monsters.Monster:
ghost Ghost undead Ghosts are the incorporeal spirits of those who cannot let go of this life or who are deemed unsuitable for purgatory.

Monster.Name: Wampyri
Monster.Description: Wampyri are powerful, bloodsucking undead monsters.

Monster.Name: Lich
Monster.Description: Liches are powerful spellcasters who have used dark necromancies to cheat death.

Monster.Name: Mud Golem
Monster.Description: The weakest of all the golem types, mud golems are fashioned from special swamp mud and animated with earth spirits.

Monster.Name: Flesh Golem
Monster.Description: Flesh golems are monstrous creations, patched together with various humanoid parts.

Monster.Name: Stone Golem
Monster.Description: Large, intimidating constructs stone golems are fashioned of granite or other tough rocky materials.

Monster.Name: Iron Golem
Monster.Description: Fashioned from pure iron, these are the most powerful conventional golems that can be constructed.

Monster.Name: Ferret
Monster.Description: Ferrets are small, fast forest creatures.

Monster.Name: Badger
Monster.Description: Badger, badger, badger, badger...

Monster.Name: Wild Dog
Monster.Description: A wild version of the domesticated dog, no longer mans best friend.

Monster.Name: Wolf
Monster.Description: Hunting animal.

Monster.Name: Warg
Monster.Description: Mutant, evil wolf. Often used a mount by maurauding orc clans.

Monster.Name: Insect Swarm
Monster.Description: A swarm of biting, stinging insects.

Monster.Name: Black Bear
Monster.Description: A small bear, but powerful and dangerous when provoked.

Monster.Name: Treant
Monster.Description: An animated twisted by dark magic.
